# [FEAT] Business Rules Engine

## Labels
`automation`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement a comprehensive business rules engine that manages all automation rules in a unified interface.

## Requirements

### Rules Overview
- Centralized rules dashboard
- Rule categories (triggers, automations, routing)
- Rule dependencies visualization
- Conflict detection
- Rule execution order management

### Rule Testing
- Test rules against sample tickets
- Preview rule effects
- Sandbox environment for testing
- Rule simulation mode

### Rule Templates
- Pre-built rule templates
- Industry-specific templates
- Import/export rules
- Clone and modify rules

### Rule Monitoring
- Rule execution statistics
- Performance impact metrics
- Error tracking
- Rule audit logs

### Rule Optimization
- Unused rule detection
- Redundant rule identification
- Performance recommendations
- Rule consolidation suggestions

## Zendesk Reference
You can customize workflows to align with business operations and manage all business rules from a centralized location.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Centralized rules dashboard
- [ ] Rule testing capabilities
- [ ] Rule templates available
- [ ] Monitoring and analytics
- [ ] Conflict detection works
